title: Print, "Design for a Knife Handle Showing Charity", 1600–25
medium: Engraving and etching on off-white laid paper
markings: verso: stamped with ovoid topped by a royal crown and showing crossing diagonal lines, as in 1946-13-1.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. A. Murray Young
description: Charity is shown in an ovoid, with two children; a pelican feeding her young is in the medallion at top. Ornament in the candelabra scheme rises from a flower basket at the bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for a Knife Handle Showing Charity", 1600–25.
1600–25. Engraving and etching on off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. A. Murray Young. 1946-33-3.
